title: Known bugs in macOS 10.12 Sierra
body:
Hey, everyone!

Apple recently launched macOS 10.12 Sierra and have just begun pushing it out to anyone who's enabled *automatic updates*. You can find the list of Macs that are getting this update **[here](http://www.apple.com/macos/how-to-upgrade/)**.

Keep in mind that new OS's are known to experience bugs with the client until our devs have had a chance to track them down and work them out. Below is a current list of bugs we're aware of and looking to fix:

**1) Editing Item Sets:** The client doesn't interact well with clicking+dragging content inside the client, therefore it's not possible to edit or create Item Sets at the moment. The workaround for this is to edit or create item sets on another computer *not running* macOS 10.12 Sierra.

**2) Editing Rune Pages:** Similarly to the issue above, you cannot click+drag runes onto a rune page at the moment. The workaround for this is to simply *double-click* on the rune to add it to the rune page.

___

If you've experienced any bugs while playing League on macOS 10.12 Sierra that aren't listed here, write a reply! We'll be passing any trending bugs to our devs for further investigation.

replies.body: I have noticed that macs have lower FPS since the recent patch, regardless of graphic settings in the game. The highest graphics setting gives me the same FPS as the lowest. It's a league issue, and I suggest optimizing league FPS for mac users.
YEEES

Ever since updating to mac 0S Sierra, I have experienced a ton of FPS drop in major team fights or crowded scenarios. Prior to update had 60 FPS +, following update in these scenarios I hover as low as 9 FPS.

I'm having crazy FPS too. I was running a 2011 MBP 15 inch and just upgraded to a 2015 MBP 15 inch with AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2048 MB with Sierra. The game now runs like complete crap. I'm getting FPS drops all over the place. 

Quite honestly, literally unplayable.
hi im having the same issue and desperate for help did u manage to fix it
Go on activity monitor. Then search for "league client" it is probaly not reacting and in a red font. Force quit it
After you quit it, how do you fix the "UserKernal is not responding" issue?
Force quit it with X symbol -> force quit

Hey there Targons Blade, i am currently having an issue for the first time on my mac with league. It has happened twice, and each time i have had to restart the computer. It is a mid 2015 Macbook Pro with the Sierra OS. Once it happened while tabbing out of the game, and the second time it happened when the game ended and went to the score board. If you can share any of your ideas on what could be the problem it would be greatly appreciated! Thank you! :') http://Imgur.com/TIosBhd  http://imgur.com/yhPwOGP

Hi there. After downloading whatever patch there was today (it took like 5 seconds) I have been unable to log in. I have tried every recommendation I have been able to find, but still get "connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server" after attempting to log in for ~2 minutes. I was playing last night, so I have no idea what could have changed.

> [{quoted}](name=3 3,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bJx6P0hX,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-10-26T19:19:35.356+0000)
>
> Hi there. After downloading whatever patch there was today (it took like 5 seconds) I have been unable to log in. I have tried every recommendation I have been able to find, but still get "connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server" after attempting to log in for ~2 minutes. I was playing last night, so I have no idea what could have changed.

I have the same bug, but only with the beta client the old client works fine. The problem is that I have to reinstall league of legends after I testet every Patch the beta client again, because the League Icon starts automated the Beta Client and so I have to start 3 Clients before I can join the Champ select and that is ugly too. I hope that will Patched 
Dedalusius

Can you please fix the issue with a usb gaming mouse connected to the mac and acting erratically... I have  a logitech gaming mouse connected to my MacBook pro and it was fine on El Capitan but on Sierra i can't control my mouses movements since the first game i played... only partial fix is turning the software mouse setting off in the client, which then i loose my scrolling speed from my mouse... please help

dude oh my god I have the exact same problem with my Razer deathadder. It goes crazy! I cant even play with this bug and turning the software settings off make it unplayable for me bro. Thank god Im not the only one having this issue
Same here, have had this problem for over 2 months now.
Yup hasn't been even touched by riot and Im quite sad. Love riot Love league but I can't play without a mouse working normally.. :c

It seems like ive had this problem since 7.1. I thought it was just my imagination or me making excuses, but your testimony convinced me this is an issue with Sierra or OSX in general. I have had to spend months destroying my mouse habits in order to play this game. It has this awful jitter that is especially bad when moving the camera in teamfights. Kiting? Forget about it. I am a one trick pony with like 500 games this season on my champ, so I know my mouse movements. But all of a sudden I find it difficult to do jungle camps without canceling autos because the mouse is so erratic. Between this and the screen tearing/fps lag in teamfights, im playing at more of a disadvantage than usual to the point where the only solution is to stop playing. 

If this is anything like that bug that rekt OS X users back in patch 6.something, the only real solution is to quit the game for a few months until Riot decides to investigate, or it just magically fixes itself one patch. I think the only fix is to downgrade from sierra. I know Riot has no reason to cater to such a small percentage of their playerbase, but man does it suck when every season there is just a 2 month window that the game is broken for Mac users and we just sit in silence hoping for a fix.
Do you know if they've fixed the problem yet? I'm on El Capitan right now, but I won't upgrade to Sierra because the mouse issue happened to my friend so he rolled his back to El Capitan

I have a brand new MacBook Pro w/ Touch Bar (late 2016) that is fully loaded to the max. It's on OS Sierra 10.12.2 and **every time I try to download the game (after installing the client) it crashes my computer around 6%**. I have tried contacting Apple to see if it was a problem on their end, but after several tests I'm 100% certain it's the game causing my computer to crash.

I have tried the following _without_ any success: 

* Restarting my computer
* Reinstalling the operating system
* Running a first aid check on my hard drive
* Deleting all league of legends files off my computer and re-downloading it

Anyone having any other tips to get the game downloaded without crashing the computer?

I recently up graded to Sierra on my Macbook and now League of Legends crashes whenever I try to play it. Sometimes it just shuts off my computer entirely. I don't know if it is related to Sierra or not, but I've been playing LoL for about a year now with no problems. Only recently has it been doing this.
I've done all of the troubleshooting methods on the support page and nothing seems to work. I reinstalled league and that didn't help. My computer doesn't seem to be overheating, as when it shuts down it isn't any warmer than usual. I am playing on the lowest graphic setting possible and it still happens.
Anyone else having this problem or know what I could do?

Since I dowloaded OS Sierra I'm having enourmous FPS problems as well. When I start it will be normal with about 60 FPS but then a few seconds after I start the game it slows down to around 8 FPS. Its impossible to play. I've tried everything: Closing applications, changing in-game settings, repairing corrupt game files, SMC Reset, AND NVRAM Reset. Nothing is working....
Same issues and I've tried evrything too
I have the same issue rn did you guys manage to fix it

Rubber-banding, random fps drops at any given time or setting, the in-game numbers show normal levels but may as well not bother playing half the time for how useless any and all adjustments I make are....
Keyboard is not working?
I'm thinking about upgrading, I hate to necro, but are there any known bugs still in the wires of League+Sierra?

Hi there, 

So my issue with this Mac so far, is that right now I cannot even get the client to launch or load at all. And I have reinstalled the game many times. The thing I have noticed is that in the Activity Monitor, it said that the "UserKernal" for the league game was not responding.  The version I am running is macOS Sierra, Version 10.12.3

Here's the list of bugs I still have with the latest version of Sierra (10.12.13)
- I can't change any in-game settings without League crashing. ANY in settings.
- Can't click "Exit Game" without crashing
- FPS drop that slowly builds as the game progresses, until about 10 minutes in it hits single digits, then 15 minutes in crashes. (I believe this can be fixed with by turning off sounds, but I can't check the box without crashing League and the setting doesn't stay.

I can't really get past these to find more bugs, but I'm sure they're there.

Sierra was released in September, completely disabling bugs should not be still around.

OS Sierra is almost halfway into it's life cycle.....have we really not cleared these issues up yet? Since the official Mac client launched  I've only had to wait a month, maybe month and a half before upgrading so League will work.....this is ridiculous.... League is literally the only reason I haven't upgraded yet.
I'm on a new touch bar MacBook Pro and randomly the game client will freeze. All the sounds still play but my picture is frozen. Only way to fix this is to alt tab out. Any news on a fix for this?
I have a Mac and I have a "black screen" issue whenever I play.After champ select,a black screen pops up and I can't do anything about it and I got a leavebuster for it.
I had this same issue happen to me and tried to delete the game and re download it. My computer now crashes whenever I try to re-download the client.
http://sendvid.com/i2ge2uqk
i was hopeful that after this new patch and maintenance the keys will work. But, its still the same problem. Not a single action was done to resolve this issue.
I'm not sure if this is another issue but whenever I try to buy new runes, even though I have more than enough IP, it says I cant buy that item. Any reason why???
I guess pinging is some sort of alt rightclick+drag, this is also glitchy

There's a bug in cierra where the mouse gets stuck to the border of the window when moving the camera and also when pinging the mouse moves in a random direction, are these bugs being worked on? They make me loose a lot of team fights
New MacBook still experiencing freezing screen in game after 7.1. Rito Help or what?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EpxamnEk-solutions-found-for-mac-users-fps-drops-and-crashes
playing in full screen mode is still not fixed!!! keys are not functioning. not even a single notice that they're looking at this problem.

Here to report a Bug in the System. it happened twice in a row. I had been playing well earlier today but for some reason when i tried to Que up for Solo/Duo it happened. When i went into Champ select the only thing i could do was select masteries/runes/spells/wards. I couldn't see the champions/map/otherplayers. it popped up with the timer at 0. So now im punished with 20 minutes from leaver buster. if you would be so kindly to fix this as soon as possible that would be great. Also idk how difficult it is to remove my last two leaves of champ select, but if you could remove that as well, that would be the best Christmas present ever. 

Sincerely a true loving player of this game 
-DaltonStrange
whenever i press play, the new tab opens but it's a black screen and im forced to restart computer, but earlier when i first downloaded lol, it worked just fine. any help?
TBH this is pissing me off, I really want to update the item sets

I'm playing on a recently updated mac running macOS sierra 10.12. Starting yesterday, after the champ select for any game the loading screen doesn't load and my mouse doesn't move. In order to get out I am forced to use a key combo ( cmd + alt + esc ) to force quit the client. I've tried many things: repairing, restarting, restarting router, and reinstalling. All lead to the same black death screen after the champ select..  When I log back in after any of these occasions, I get the in game status and click the reconnect to no avail it just goes black once again. 
 I'm sure its not a networking issue as I've tried one person custom games and that doesn't quite work either. Also regardless everything up to and including champ select works sooooo. The only scenario I can think of is some incompatibility with the new OS. Hopefully Riot releases a fix for this soon, it is quite a bummer at the beginning of a new ranked season.

Any suggestions are welcome, 
 Cheers and Happy Holidays
I deleted the new client because it was not leting me open the game and nw it is doing the same thing for the old one what do i do plz help me.
The same thing is happening to me. What is it saying before it closes cause mine tells me that the user kernel is not working?
Im on mac and cant seem to click the Redeem Codes button in the store nor the Purchase RP button, they highlight but nothing happens upon clicking them

Whenever my mac sleeps when the display turns off I get thrown out of lol (like usual) -  when I try to double-click to launch the app only to have an error pop up saying that lol is already running when it is not (it doesn't show up in the programs I can 'force quit') I end up having to restart my mac every time this happens so I can log in.
+my mouse occasionally disappears during the game (I become unable to target anything) - as for outside the game, lol tends to change the size of the mouse just by moving it across the screen) 
*will this issue with macOS 10.12 Sierra persist even after the beginning of the new season?

Am I the only one who's had pretty much the same FPS since Yosemite? If I set to low graphics, I get 60+ FPS while roaming by myself, then team fights it drops to under 20 FPS. But that's been the case since I got my computer 3 years ago. It hasn't improved but it hasn't gotten worse either after upgrading to sierra. I'm running a Late 2013 13 in Macbook Pro
